flawed_nl_solution:
The plant has $10 x 10/100 = $100/1 discount.
So, Rose paid $10 - $100/1 = $<<10-100/1=-90>>-90 for the plant.
#### -90

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1, not 100/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
